name: Namaste Virtual Yoga Retreat
description: Check in to the Namaste Virtual Yoga Retreat and learn this ancient art of fitness from a professional, experienced yoga instructor. Escape to a hidden place, a place just for you, far away from the stressors of daily life. Enter into a beautiful, natural space and revitalize with the gentle, yet challenging movements of Yoga.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Storage: 11 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE NOT SUPPORTED AT THIS TIME
